directions: Place vegan cheese in a microwave-safe bowl. Microwave at 900W for 1 minute. Remove from the microwave. Pour in 1/2 cup water, stirring constantly. Microwave at 900W for 1 minute more. Stir to create a smooth texture. Continue to add water and microwave until desired consistency is reached.
Fold diced tomatoes and black beans into the queso. Top with pickled jalapenos. Serve warm.
ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) can diced tomatoes and green chiles (such as RO*TEL®)
½ cup canned Mexican-style black beans
title: Jacked-Up Vegan Queso
